Name: Ice Serum Lv.3
Description: Increases Ice strength, boosting Ice skill damage. Recommended for Frost Mage.
Description$english: Increases Ice strength, boosting Ice skill damage. Recommended for Frost Mage.
Description2$english: A magical potion meticulously crafted through the recrystallization and reorganization of elemental particles using alchemical techniques. It is not only favored by adventurers for its excellent effects but also attracts a large number of "uniquely tasteful" non-adventurers with its distinctive flavor.

recipes.Name: Advanced: Ice Serum
recipes.Des:
Crafting yields products Lv.2 and Lv.3 at rates of 85% and 15%, respectively.
This ice-distilled Serum is carried by adventurers to amplify their Ice strength for a brief duration.
recipes.Des$english:
Crafting yields products Lv.2 and Lv.3 at rates of 85% and 15%, respectively.
This ice-distilled Serum is carried by adventurers to amplify their Ice strength for a brief duration.

NeedMaterial.Name: Ice Particle Lv.3
NeedMaterial.Description: Alchemy material used to craft Ice Serum and Ice Drop.
NeedMaterial.Description$english: Alchemy material used to craft Ice Serum and Ice Drop.
NeedMaterial.Description2$english: A crystal particle of the Ice, with an internal structure of a perfect hexagonal ice crystal. The facets appear as if stained by stardust, seemingly freezing time itself.

recipes.Name: Ice Particle Lv.3
recipes.Des: Alchemy material used to craft Ice Serum and Ice Drop. Obtained from Artisanry​.
recipes.Des$english: Alchemy material used to craft Ice Serum and Ice Drop. Obtained from Artisanry​.

NeedMaterial.Name: Ice Crystal Shard Lv.3
NeedMaterial.Description: Can be obtained during Monster Hunts, and after precise processing, it can be used for Alchemy. It is a basic material.
NeedMaterial.Description$english: Can be obtained during Monster Hunts, and after precise processing, it can be used for Alchemy. It is a basic material.
NeedMaterial.Description2$english: A crystal rich in Engram. Easy to collect and process. Due to absorbing Engram from the atmosphere and underground during crystallization, its specific composition and shape vary by region.

NeedMaterial.Name: Potion Catalyst - ENH
NeedMaterial.Description: A material needed for Alchemy that can activate the elemental attack abilities within raw materials.
NeedMaterial.Description$english: A material needed for Alchemy that can activate the elemental attack abilities within raw materials.
NeedMaterial.Description2$english: Two substances that originally do not interact will undergo a transformation upon contact with a specific medium. This change induced by a specific substance is vividly referred to as the "catalyst effect" in alchemical techniques.

recipes.Name: Potion Catalyst - ENH
recipes.Des: Two substances that originally do not interact will undergo a transformation upon contact with a specific medium. This change induced by a specific substance is vividly referred to as the "catalyst effect" in alchemical techniques.
recipes.Des$english: Two substances that originally do not interact will undergo a transformation upon contact with a specific medium. This change induced by a specific substance is vividly referred to as the "catalyst effect" in alchemical techniques.

NeedMaterial.Name: Buds
NeedMaterial.Description: Collected resource that can be processed further with Life Skills.
NeedMaterial.Description$english: Collected resource that can be processed further with Life Skills.
NeedMaterial.Description2$english: In their free-living state, buds exhibit no discernible metabolic activity and exist in a dormant phase characterized as cryptobiosis. Upon encountering favorable environmental conditions, they resume activity and germinate into vegetative cells.

NeedMaterial.Name: Boiled Water
NeedMaterial.Description2$english: Water purified through the process of heating to eliminate impurities.

recipes.Name: Boiled Water
recipes.Des: Water purified through the process of heating to eliminate impurities.
recipes.Des$english: Water purified through the process of heating to eliminate impurities.

NeedMaterial.Name: Limpid Azure Water
NeedMaterial.Description: Naturally harvested, it can be used in cooking or further processed for a variety of versatile applications.
NeedMaterial.Description$english: Naturally harvested, it can be used in cooking or further processed for a variety of versatile applications.
